com.percussion.content
Class PSContentConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.content.PSContentConverter

public class PSContentConverter
extends Object

Utility class to convert data from multiple file formats to either plain text.

Constructor Detail

PSContentConverter

public PSContentConverter(int outputFormat,
                          boolean useLinefeed,
                          String htmlTemplate,
                          String outputEncoding,
                          int pdfConversion)
                   throws PSContentConversionException
Deprecated. This constructor has been deprecated. Use PSContentConverter(String).

Construct a converter with the specified options.

Parameters:
outputFormat - The output format used to return the converted data, either #FORMAT_TEXT or #FORMAT_HTML.
useLinefeed - true to convert carriage returns to linefeeds, false to use carriage returns for line endings. Ignored if outputFormat is TYPE_HTML.
htmlTemplate - The template file to use to generate HTML results, may be null or empty to use the default template. To use a conversion template other than the default, it must be placed on the server hosting the search engine (which may not be hosting the Rx server). This parameter value must specify a valid file path to that template file, and it must be relative to the value specified for INSTALL_DIR, which is the value provided when running the installer (defaults to rxroot/sys_search/rware).
outputEncoding - Specifies encoding to use for the converted output. If not specified, then WINDOWS-1252 is used for TEXT, UTF-8 for HTML. Specifying an unsupported encoding will produce an error . Note that this may result in loss of data if the source file uses characters outside of that character set. Currently only the following encodings may be specified:
  • SHIFT_JIS (Japanese)
  • EUC_KR (Korean)
  • GB2312 (Simple Chinese)
  • BIG5 (Traditional Chinese)
May be null or empty. Comparison is case-insensitive.
pdfConversion - Indicates how the conversion should be performed if the file type is determined to be a PDF (it is ignored otherwise). Must be one of the PDF_XXX values.
Throws:
PSContentConversionException - this contructor has been dropped use PSContentConverter(String).

PSContentConverter

public PSContentConverter(String mimetype)
                   throws PSContentConversionException
Parameters:
mimetype - The mimetype of the input stream must not be null or empty.
Throws:
PSContentConversionException
Method Detail

convert

public PSConversionResults convert(InputStream data)
                            throws PSContentConversionException
Deprecated. This method has been deprecated use extractText method. Throws PSContentConversionException if any if called.

Performs the conversion using the options specified during construction.

Parameters:
data - The data to convert, may not be null. This method assumes ownership of the supplied stream.
Returns:
A results object that may be used to retrieve the converted data, never null.
Throws:
PSContentConversionException - if an unsupported file type is supplied, or if there are any errors.

extractText

public String extractText(InputStream data)
                   throws PSContentConversionException
Extracts the text from the supplied input stream.

Parameters:
data - The data from which the text needs to be extracted. Must not be null. This method assumes ownership of the supplied stream.
Returns:
Extracted text may be empty but never null.
Throws:
PSContentConversionException - in case of an error converting to text.
